name: The Caribbean Cowboys
description:
Background:

You sail carefully through the Caribbean, but still be spotted by pirates. You need to defeat the pirates, protect your ship, and get yourself safely out of the Caribbean.

Notes:

The game is a naval battle between two gunboats, the player vs CPU. Both sides have to control their boat position to dodge incoming bullets, and the weapons to hit the enemy boat until one of them is destroyed. There are totally 5 levels and each level has 2 pirates to shoot. The enemy will equip increasingly stronger weapons each level till the final level. At the final level, there is one big boss.  Beat him and you win!

Instructions:

You can use arrow keys or "W" "A" "S" "D" keys to control your ship and "J" key to shoot.
